statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE processing_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities ORDER BY processing_capacity DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Plastic%' ORDER BY facility_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE facility_id > 3 ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE processing_capacity >= 5000 ORDER BY processing_capacity ASC;
SELECT COUNT(facility_id) AS total_facilities, SUM(processing_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, location, plastic_type, capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities JOIN processing_capacities ON plastic_recycling_facilities.id = processing_capacities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT prf.facility_name, pc.plastic_type, pc.capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities prf JOIN processing_capacities pc ON prf.id = pc.facility_id WHERE pc.capacity > 50 ORDER BY prf.facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM processing_capacities WHERE plastic_type LIKE 'PET%' AND capacity < 100;

SELECT prf.facility_name, prf.location, pc.plastic_type, pc.capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities prf JOIN processing_capacities pc ON prf.id = pc.facility_id WHERE prf.location = 'California' ORDER BY pc.capacity DESC, prf.facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facilities ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity_in_tons FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE capacity_in_tons > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, capacity_in_tons FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_inventory ORDER BY quantity_in_tons DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity_in_tons FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT * FROM plastic_processing_capacities WHERE processing_type = 'Mechanical';

SELECT facility_name, location, pp.capacity_in_tons_per_day FROM plastic_recycling_facilities prf JOIN plastic_processing_capacities pp ON prf.facility_id = pp.facility_id WHERE pp.capacity_in_tons_per_day > 50;
SELECT pwc.facility_id, prf.facility_name, pwc.waste_type FROM plastic_waste_inventory pwc JOIN plastic_recycling_facilities prf ON pwc.facility_id = prf.facility_id WHERE pwc.quantity_in_tons > 100;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_inventory WHERE waste_type IN ('PET', 'HDPE', 'LDPE') ORDER BY quantity_in_tons DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facilities WHERE processing_capacity > 1000;
SELECT material_type, recyclability_rating FROM plastic_materials WHERE recyclability_rating >= 4;
SELECT facility_name, location, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, processing_capacity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities ORDER BY processing_capacity DESC, facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facilities;
SELECT material_type, recyclability_rating FROM plastic_materials WHERE recyclability_rating > 3;
SELECT f.facility_name, m.material_type FROM plastic_recycling_facilities f JOIN facility_inventory i ON f.facility_id = i.facility_id JOIN plastic_materials m ON i.material_id = m.material_id;

SELECT f.facility_name, p.processing_date, i.quantity FROM plastic_recycling_facilities f JOIN processing_logs p ON f.facility_id = p.facility_id JOIN facility_inventory i ON p.facility_id = i.facility_id AND p.material_id = i.material_id;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_material FROM plastic_recycling_facilities f JOIN facility_inventory i ON f.facility_id = i.facility_id GROUP BY f.facility_name;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facility WHERE capacity_kg_per_hour > 1000;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM plastic_recycling_facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_recycling_process WHERE efficiency > 0.8;

SELECT facility_name, SUM(monthly_processing_kg) AS total_monthly_processing_kg FROM plastic_recycling_facility JOIN plastic_recycling_stats ON plastic_recycling_facility.facility_id = plastic_recycling_stats.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM plastic_recycling_facility;
SELECT process_type, efficiency FROM plastic_recycling_process WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT point_name, location, capacity_kg FROM plastic_collection_point ORDER BY capacity_kg DESC;
SELECT year, monthly_processing_kg FROM plastic_recycling_stats WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY monthly_processing_kg DESC;
SELECT facility_name, capacity_kg_per_hour FROM plastic_recycling_facility WHERE capacity_kg_per_hour > 500 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
